title: Is it socially acceptable to scold a child you don't know?
body:
I saw this 2-3-4 year old kid in a shopping cart the other day being pushed by his sister. He was chewing on his crock. Just to make sure it wasn't like a weird type clean item his parents gave him, I checked his feet. Yeah, he has the other crock on his foot. It was the shoe he was wearing to walk around with.

Not gunna lie, I was a little mortified. Then, the ostensible mother turned around and saw what I was looking at and she said nothing... a few seconds go by, she looks again, nothing.

Is it now my job to tell that little shit to get the dirty disease, virus, chemical, and who knows what else shoe out of his god damn mouth?
